title: Battery Mix for Android Wear
summary: Battery Mix supports Android Wear!Identify battery-draining apps!
developerAddress:
〒150-0031
東京都渋谷区桜丘町17-12　渋谷ジョンソンビル4FS100576

description: Battery Mix provides information about your battery and phone's active apps.・Graphs your battery usage info in detail・Monitors active apps
descriptionHTML:
Battery Mix provides information about your battery and phone's active apps.

・Graphs your battery usage info in detail
・Monitors active apps
comments: Only Half Works Battery graph shows. App details do not. Tried every combination of taps and swipes. Android Wear built-in battery stats has more info. Are we missing some miracle way of getting more information in this app?
Sorta works This works if your trying to ID a fast battery drain. But without keeping the data on the phone app so you can review day over day changes makes this a meh app.
Worked for the first week I had it, but hasn't updated the battery level for over a week now... A good UI but the failing functionality makes it useless!
Cant see app stats? Is not working
Not seeing App stats, graph is OK. NB: Nexus 7, Marshmallow
Can't show each App use battery status. How to see that?
